channel.title: [562] Personal Message system shows players as mods and admins?
channel.description:
Hi,
The title says it all, I cant fix this because i cant find the .java file that is displaying this. When i am talking to my players i get a admin icon next to their name and sometimes a mod icon.
Are there any solutions?
Thanks.

item.title: [562] Personal Message system shows players as mods and admins?
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

Expedition:

have u checked the sprites client sided make sure the ranks are receiving the correcxt sprites p.s i might be wrong just trying to give it a guess hopefully it helps

I taught all clients were the same because im using another client, the source base i got is infinity but the guy hasnâ€™t released a client with it so i used future x client.
